titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for suppressing of light golde
Proclamations. 1620-02-07
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Newmarket, the seuenth day of February, in the seuenteenth yeare of our raigne ..
This edition has arms without "IR" at top (arms 11).
The year date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Identified as STC 8623 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
